column4: Help! I just got my Ubuntu 6.06 from ShipIt today and I can't upgrade from Breezy. How do I go about doing so?
i had breezy and upgraded with the download link it worked fine
I'm on dialup, it'll take me ages to upgrade via the internet
then try a app from hiedy called eraser.  make a floppy and boot with it .it will over write your hdd and will leave you with a clean install. warning you WILL loose all your data.
